scripts.setup:local: mkdir -p .dbdata && yarn start && yarn ddb:wait && yarn ddb:init
scripts.ddb:wait: until nc -z localhost 9010; do sleep 1; done && echo "DynamoDB started" && sleep 2
scripts.ddb:init:ws: aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://ddb-ws.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:9010 --region ap-southeast-1 --output text
scripts.ddb:init:orders: aws dynamodb create-table --cli-input-json file://ddb-orders.json --endpoint-url http://localhost:9010 --region ap-southeast-1 --output text
